entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
